mapper.select: INSERT INTO app_order_archive ( `bid`, `sale_no`, `bname`, `airport_id`, `airportname`, `pid`, `province`, `sex`, `photo`, `order_num`, `file_time`, `year`, `month`, `day`, `dayweek` ) SELECT su.id, ao.sale_no, su.`name`, ao.airport_id, sa.airport_name, sc.CID, sc.`name`, su.sex, su.photo, COUNT(ao.order_id) AS total_nums, #{maxTime}, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%Y') AS YEAR, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%m') AS MONTH, DATE_FORMAT(#{maxTime},'%d') AS DAY, WEEKDAY(#{maxTime})+1 FROM app_orders ao INNER JOIN sys_users su ON ao.sale_no = su.`code` INNER JOIN sys_airport sa ON sa.airport_id = ao.airport_id LEFT JOIN sys_city sc ON sc.CID = sa.province WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ao.order_time,'%Y-%m-%d') =#{maxTime} AND ao.pay_time IS NOT NULL and sa.state=0 and sa.dtflag=0 GROUP BY ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id

INSERT INTO app_back_archive ( `file_time`, `order_num_back`, `sale_no`, `airport_id`, pid ) SELECT #{maxTime}, count(card.back_id) AS back_order_num, ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id AS airport_id, sa.`province` FROM `app_card_back` card INNER JOIN `app_orders` ao ON card.order_id = ao.order_id INNER JOIN `sys_airport` sa ON sa.`airport_id`=ao.`airport_id` WHERE DATE_FORMAT( card.finish_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{maxTime} GROUP BY ao.sale_no, ao.airport_id

SELECT concat(#{currentTime},'$',pid) as cacheKey, pcount, case when SUM(aoa.order_num) is null then 0 else SUM(aoa.order_num) end AS total, case when SUM(aoa.order_num) / pcount is null then 0 else SUM(aoa.order_num) / pcount end AS avgNum, aoa.pid FROM app_order_archive aoa left join ( SELECT sa.airport_id , case when count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) is null then 0 else count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) end as pcount FROM sys_airport sa inner JOIN sys_user_airport sua ON sa.airport_id = sua.airport_id group by sa.airport_id ) A on A.airport_id=aoa.airport_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(aoa.file_time, '%Y-%m-%d') =#{currentTime} GROUP BY aoa.pid

SELECT concat(#{currentTime},'$',pid) as cacheKey, pcount, case when SUM(aba.order_num_back) is null then 0 else SUM(aba.order_num_back) end AS back_order_total, case when SUM(aba.order_num_back) / pcount is null then 0 else SUM(aba.order_num_back) / pcount end AS avgNum_back, aba.pid FROM app_back_archive aba left join ( SELECT sa.airport_id , case when count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) is null then 0 else count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) end as pcount FROM sys_airport sa inner JOIN sys_user_airport sua ON sa.airport_id = sua.airport_id group by sa.airport_id ) A on A.airport_id=aba.airport_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(aba.file_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentTime} GROUP BY aba.pid

SELECT concat(#{currentTime},"$",aoa.pid,'$',aoa.airport_id) AS cacheKey, sum(aoa.order_num) AS total, B.pcount, CASE WHEN sum(aoa.order_num) / pcount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aoa.order_num) / pcount END AS avgNum FROM app_order_archive aoa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sa.airport_id , case when count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) is null then 0 else count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) end as pcount FROM sys_airport sa inner JOIN sys_user_airport sua ON sa.airport_id = sua.airport_id group by sa.airport_id ) B ON aoa.airport_id = B.airport_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(aoa.file_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentTime} GROUP BY aoa.pid, aoa.airport_id

SELECT concat(#{currentTime},"$",aba.pid,'$',aba.airport_id) AS cacheKey, sum(aba.order_num_back) AS back_order_total, B.pcount, CASE WHEN sum(aba.order_num_back) / pcount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE sum(aba.order_num_back)/ pcount END AS avgNum_back FROM app_back_archive aba LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sa.airport_id , case when count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) is null then 0 else count(DISTINCT sua.sys_id) end as pcount FROM sys_airport sa inner JOIN sys_user_airport sua ON sa.airport_id = sua.airport_id group by sa.airport_id ) B ON aba.airport_id = B.airport_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(aba.file_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{currentTime} GROUP BY aba.pid, aba.airport_id
